text: Andrei Novicov (born 24 April 1986, Tiraspol, Moldova) is a Moldavian football Defender who plays for FC Sfântul Gheorghe Suruceni. ==Club statistics== *Total matches played in Moldavian First League: 161 matches - 20 goal ==References== ==External links== * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Moldovan footballers Category:Moldovan National Division players Category:FC Sheriff Tiraspol players Category:FC Tiraspol players Category:FC Zaria Bălți players Category:FC Milsami players Category:FC Sfântul Gheorghe Suruceni players Category:Association football forwards
title: Andrei Novicov
